title: Fake News! Amazon Is Not Selling Atal Bihari Vajpayee’s Ashes
subtitle: A picture of former Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee’s ashes is going viral on social media with users claiming that his ashes are being sold on e-commerce giant Amazon. However, it is fake.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, there is no truth to this image.

A simple search on Amazon shows that no product by the name of “Atal Ji’s original ashes” is being sold.
